Shellder

Type HP Attack Defense Speed Special Attack Special Defense Total
30 65 100 40 45 25 305
#97 0' 1.3"
8.82 lbs. 		Bivalve Pokémon At night, it burrows a hole in the seafloor with its broad tongue to make a place to sleep. While asleep, it closes its shell, but leaves its tongue hanging out.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Shell Armor 42 A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
1 Skill Link 33 Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
18 Overcoat 2 Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.
36 Rock Head 14 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
54 Anger Shell 57 When HP drops to half or less, defenses are lowered but attack and Speed are raised.
72 Sturdy 16 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
90 Storm Drain 18 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Water-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
100 Protean 80 Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 01 Battle Armor 60 Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Disc 05 Immunity 2 The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.
Disc 21 Rock Head 14 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
Disc 24 Frostproof 12 The Pokémon resists Ice-type moves and damage from frostbite.
Disc 26 Super Luck 35 The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
Disc 34 Water Absorb 15 Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move instead of taking damage.
Disc 52 Damp 2 Prevents the use of explosive moves, such as Self-Destruct, by dampening its surroundings.
Disc 54 Storm Drain 18 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Water-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
Disc 60 Overcoat 2 Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Adaptability 77 Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
Anger Shell 57 When HP drops to half or less, defenses are lowered but attack and Speed are raised.
Cecity -19 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
Cold-Blooded 33 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Distillize 77 Normal-type moves become Water-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Heavy Water 7 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats in Rain.
Hydration 23 Heals status conditions if it's raining.
Klutz -25 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Predictable -13 This Pokémon's predictable maneuvers make moves hit against it without fail.
Protean 80 Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.
Rain Dish 7 The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
Shell Armor 42 A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Skill Link 33 Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
Slow Start -94 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Sprinkle Spit 43 The Pokémon makes it rain when it's hit by an attack.
Stall -12 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Sturdy 16 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
Torrent 14 Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Truant -67 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Water Veil 17 The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
Weak Armor 27 Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
